name: Save The Rabbits
description:
Your duty is to free the bunnies from their cages! They will follow you without hesitation but the lasers won't hurt you but the bunnies will! Try to save the largest number of bunnies in the shortest possible time.
Controls:
WASD - Move.
Space->Jump and bump
Double Space->Hard bump.
Left Click->Make the rabbits go to a certain point.
Right Click-> Enable/Disable rabbit tracking.
Enjoy!!!
